title: Did ‘The Simpsons’ Mayor Say He Canceled Trip to the Bahamas While in the Bahamas?
subtitle: A clip from "The Simpsons" was shared on social media after reports that Sen. Ted Cruz had traveled to Cancun after a winter storm caused massive power outages in Texas.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: In an episode of "The Simpsons," Mayor Quimby says he is canceling a trip to the Bahamas while he's in the Bahamas, because of an ongoing epidemic.
